title: AvianLord6495
author: AvianLord6495
content: Greetings! I'm on a quest to find some ethereum & bitcoin cash mining sites/apps that have a considerably lower threshold for minimum withdrawal My plan is to reach whatever the would-be minimum payout thresholds, add it all up and then sell the crypto. I'm looking to setup as many as I can to get ideally $4,500 - $6000 in Crypto as quick as possible; then sell the crypto. The money I received then will go towards groceries and anything else beyond. Such as investing in the best paid online traffic methods in efforts to make money online via online content creation. I've recently been spending some time devising strategies and formulating plans to make money working smart rather than hard.If not, could I in any way make this work with any other cryptocurrencies? Thanks!

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Sadly, most of the cloud mining websites today are likely scams. That's why if you ever to invest into them, expect that it's not going to be good on your end.Quote from: AvianLord6495 on November 23, 2022, 07:58:51 PMSuch as investing in the best paid online traffic methods in efforts to make money online via online content creation. I've recently been spending some time devising strategies and formulating plans to make money working smart rather than hard.Like the gig economy, you can look for clients and have them worked by someone else which is called outsourcing. Yeah, that's working smartly.Quote from: AvianLord6495 on November 23, 2022, 07:58:51 PMIf not, could I in any way make this work with any other cryptocurrencies? Thanks!There's no other way than these; trading, staking, and real mining through GPU and ASIC.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Cloud mining has been always a waste of time and money. If you setup a large number of smartphones to mine on those apps you are probably going to lose money due to expensive electricity and devices' detrition, when compared to the income paid by the apps. Paid online traffic is another thing you should be careful. I'm sure ads won't pay fake traffic. They want organic traffic, and once you are caught cheating payment is going to be denied and your account is going to blocked. You can create crypto content, that is legit, but you also need legit audience to your website.

Yes, years ago fake cloud mining sites were very popular and offered high interest rates. They were in fact ponzi schemes. The greediest ones used to last few days or weeks, the humblest ones used to last a month or few months, depending the rates proposed by the scammers. The systems were elaborated and showed real time results, that is, the coins being hypothetically mined directly to your balance every second.This concept incentivized and tempted many enthusiasts to invest and watch the coins coming in to their wallets.Some people achieved ROI, but without any doubts, for most investors it was a complete loss.

At least the risk is that that huge as compare to looking for cloud mining as passive income, in my opinion.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: I saw your thread on the Mining board, Cloud mining for bitcoin.As how that thread goes, the answer is, it is very unlikely that you found such platforms to meet your goal. Cloud mining is generally shady, and expecting a fast profit makes your goal likely impossible. You can't mine on ETH since it has already been merged into PoS, and BCH has no future. Bear in mind, the motive to earn quick cash is where many people fall down in this space, and what you are seeking is unreasonable since the current cryptocurrency mining profitability is in a low season.
